member.name: T:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.DelegatingConverterBase
member.summary: Converter which does nothing but delegate to another one for all operations.
member.remarks: Nothing in this class is specific to Noda Time. Its purpose is to make it easy to reuse other converter instances with , which can only identify a converter by type.

example.para: If you had some properties which needed one converter, but others that needed another, you might want to have different types implementing those converters. Each type would just derive from this, passing the right converter into the base constructor.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.DelegatingConverterBase.#ctor(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConverter)
member.summary: Constructs a converter delegating to .
member.param: The converter to delegate to. Must not be null.

member.name: T:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.Extensions
member.summary: Static class containing extension methods to configure Json.NET for Noda Time types.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.Extensions.ConfigureForNodaTime(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings,NodaTime.IDateTimeZoneProvider)
member.summary: Configures Json.NET with everything required to properly serialize and deserialize NodaTime data types.
member.param: The existing settings to add Noda Time converters to.
The time zone provider to use when parsing time zones and zoned date/times.
member.returns: The original value, for further chaining.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.Extensions.ConfigureForNodaTime(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer,NodaTime.IDateTimeZoneProvider)
member.summary: Configures Json.NET with everything required to properly serialize and deserialize NodaTime data types.
member.param: The existing serializer to add Noda Time converters to.
The time zone provider to use when parsing time zones and zoned date/times.
member.returns: The original value, for further chaining.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.Extensions.WithIsoIntervalConverter(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Configures the given serializer settings to use . Any other converters which can convert are removed from the serializer.
member.param: The existing serializer settings to add Noda Time converters to.
member.returns: The original value, for further chaining.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.Extensions.WithIsoIntervalConverter(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Configures the given serializer to use . Any other converters which can convert are removed from the serializer.
member.param: The existing serializer to add Noda Time converters to.
member.returns: The original value, for further chaining.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.Extensions.WithIsoDateIntervalConverter(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializerSettings)
member.summary: Configures the given serializer settings to use . Any other converters which can convert are removed from the serializer.
member.param: The existing serializer settings to add Noda Time converters to.
member.returns: The original value, for further chaining.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.Extensions.WithIsoDateIntervalConverter(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Configures the given serializer to use . Any other converters which can convert are removed from the serializer.
member.param: The existing serializer to add Noda Time converters to.
member.returns: The original value, for further chaining.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.Extensions.ResolvePropertyName(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer,System.String)
member.summary:
Resolves property name according .
If serializer is not then original returns.
member.param: The serializer to use name resolve.
Property name.

summary.para: The NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet namespace contains support code to enable JSON serialization for Noda Time types using Json.NET.
Code in this namespace is included in the NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet NuGet package.

member.name: T:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverterBase`1
member.summary: Base class for all the Json.NET converters which handle value types (which is most of them). This deals handles all the boilerplate code dealing with nullity.
member.typeparam: The type to convert to/from JSON.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverterBase`1.CanConvert(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns whether or not this converter supports the given type.
member.param: The type to check for compatibility.
member.returns: True if the given type is supported by this converter (including the nullable form for value types); false otherwise.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverterBase`1.ReadJson(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReader,System.Type,System.Object,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Converts the JSON stored in a reader into the relevant Noda Time type.
member.param: The Json.NET reader to read data from.
The type to convert the JSON to.
An existing value; ignored by this converter.
A serializer to use for any embedded deserialization.
member.exception: The JSON was invalid for this converter.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverterBase`1.ReadJsonImpl(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReader,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Implemented by concrete subclasses, this performs the final conversion from a non-null JSON value to a value of type T.
member.param: The JSON reader to pull data from
The serializer to use for nested serialization
member.returns: The deserialized value of type T.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverterBase`1.WriteJson(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonWriter,System.Object,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Writes the given value to a Json.NET writer.
member.param: The writer to write the JSON to.
The value to write.
The serializer to use for any embedded serialization.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverterBase`1.WriteJsonImpl(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonWriter,`0,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Implemented by concrete subclasses, this performs the final write operation for a non-null value of type T to JSON.
member.param: The writer to write JSON data to
The value to serializer
The serializer to use for nested serialization

member.name: T:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters
member.summary: Convenience class to expose preconfigured converters for Noda Time types, and factory methods for creating those which require parameters.

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.InstantConverter
member.summary: Converter for instants, using the ISO-8601 date/time pattern, extended as required to accommodate milliseconds and ticks, and specifying 'Z' at the end to show it's effectively in UTC.

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.LocalDateConverter
member.summary: Converter for local dates, using the ISO-8601 date pattern.

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.LocalDateTimeConverter
member.summary: Converter for local dates and times, using the ISO-8601 date/time pattern, extended as required to accommodate milliseconds and ticks. No time zone designator is applied.

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.LocalTimeConverter
member.summary: Converter for local times, using the ISO-8601 time pattern, extended as required to accommodate milliseconds and ticks.

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.IntervalConverter
member.summary: Converter for intervals. This must be used in a serializer which also has an instant converter.

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.IsoIntervalConverter
member.summary: Converter for intervals using extended ISO-8601 format, as output by .

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.DateIntervalConverter
member.summary: Converter for date intervals. This must be used in a serializer which also has a local date converter.

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.IsoDateIntervalConverter
member.summary: Converter for date intervals using ISO-8601 format, as defined by .

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.OffsetConverter
member.summary: Converter for offsets.

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.OffsetDateTimeConverter
member.summary: Converter for offset date/times.

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.OffsetDateConverter
member.summary: Converter for offset dates.

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.OffsetTimeConverter
member.summary: Converter for offset times.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.CreateZonedDateTimeConverter(NodaTime.IDateTimeZoneProvider)
member.summary: Creates a converter for zoned date/times, using the given time zone provider.
member.param: The time zone provider to use when parsing.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.CreateDateTimeZoneConverter(NodaTime.IDateTimeZoneProvider)
member.summary: Creates a converter for time zones, using the given provider.
member.param: The time zone provider to use when parsing.

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.DurationConverter
member.summary: Converter for durations.

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.RoundtripPeriodConverter
member.summary: Round-tripping converter for periods. Use this when you really want to preserve information, and don't need interoperability with systems expecting ISO.

member.name: P:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaConverters.NormalizingIsoPeriodConverter
member.summary: Normalizing ISO converter for periods. Use this when you want compatibility with systems expecting ISO durations (~= Noda Time periods). However, note that Noda Time can have negative periods. Note that this converter losees information - after serialization and deserialization, "90 minutes" will become "an hour and 30 minutes".

member.name: T:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaDateIntervalConverter
member.summary: Json.NET converter for using a compound representation. The start and end aspects of the date interval are represented with separate properties, each parsed and formatted by the converter for the serializer provided.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaDateIntervalConverter.ReadJsonImpl(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReader,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Reads Start and End properties for the start and end of a date interval, converting them to local dates using the given serializer.
member.param: The JSON reader to fetch data from.
The serializer for embedded serialization.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaDateIntervalConverter.WriteJsonImpl(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonWriter,NodaTime.DateInterval,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Serializes the date interval as start/end local dates.
member.param: The writer to write JSON to
The date interval to serialize
The serializer for embedded serialization.

member.name: T:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaDateTimeZoneConverter
member.summary: Json.NET converter for .

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaDateTimeZoneConverter.#ctor(NodaTime.IDateTimeZoneProvider)
member.param: Provides the that corresponds to each time zone ID in the JSON string.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaDateTimeZoneConverter.ReadJsonImpl(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReader,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Reads the time zone ID (which must be a string) from the reader, and converts it to a time zone.
member.param: The JSON reader to fetch data from.
The serializer for embedded serialization.
member.exception: The provider does not support a time zone with the given ID.
member.returns: The identified in the JSON, or null.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaDateTimeZoneConverter.WriteJsonImpl(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonWriter,NodaTime.DateTimeZone,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Writes the time zone ID to the writer.
member.param: The writer to write JSON data to
The value to serializer
The serializer to use for nested serialization

member.name: T:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaIntervalConverter
member.summary: Json.NET converter for using a compound representation. The start and end aspects of the interval are represented with separate properties, each parsed and formatted by the converter for the serializer provided.

member.summary: Reads Start and End properties for the start and end of an interval, converting them to instants using the given serializer.
member.param: The JSON reader to fetch data from.
The serializer for embedded serialization.

member.summary: Serializes the interval as start/end instants.
member.param: The writer to write JSON to
The interval to serialize
The serializer for embedded serialization.

member.summary: Json.NET converter for .

member.summary: Serializes the date interval as start/end dates.

The date interval to serialize

member.summary: Json.NET converter for .

member.summary: Serializes the interval as start/end instants.

member.name: T:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaPatternConverter`1
member.summary: A JSON converter for types which can be represented by a single string value, parsed or formatted from an .
member.typeparam: The type to convert to/from JSON.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaPatternConverter`1.#ctor(NodaTime.Text.IPattern{`0})
member.summary: Creates a new instance with a pattern and no validator.
member.param: The pattern to use for parsing and formatting.

member.name: M:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.NodaPatternConverter`1.#ctor(NodaTime.Text.IPattern{`0},System.Action{`0})
member.summary: Creates a new instance with a pattern and an optional validator. The validator will be called before each value is written, and may throw an exception to indicate that the value cannot be serialized.
member.param: The pattern to use for parsing and formatting.
The validator to call before writing values. May be null, indicating that no validation is required.

member.summary: Implemented by concrete subclasses, this performs the final conversion from a non-null JSON value to a value of type T.
member.param: The JSON reader to pull data from
The serializer to use for nested serialization
member.returns: The deserialized value of type T.

member.summary: Writes the formatted value to the writer.

The value to serializer
The serializer to use for nested serialization

member.name: T:NodaTime.Serialization.JsonNet.Preconditions
member.summary: Helper static methods for argument/state validation. (Just the subset used within this library.)
